body_html: Yes, 4 GPU is not the distributed setting. OK, I know the point. I will adjust the Multi-GPU version until it is close to the one-GPU version. And, according to your experience, Mult-GPU version is just slightly slower than one-GPU version, right ?

body: Yes, 4 GPU is not the distributed setting. OK, I know the point. I will adjust the Multi-GPU version until it is close to the one-GPU version.  _And, according to your experience, Mult-GPU version is just slightly slower than one-GPU version, right ?_
